roleset.name: shorten/remove part of a word, mathematical figure
roleset.note: TRUNCATE-V NOTES: Roleset for 'truncate' based on parallel additions to VerbNet, PropBank, and sense groupings. Framed by Claire (from truncate.01-v)

role.descr: extent of truncation, how much was removed?
end state, final length, size after truncation

example.name: Shortening words
example.text: The librarian truncates the word by adding an asterisk at the end of the word.
example.arg: by adding an asterisk at the end of the word.

example.name: Shortening numbers, with arg4
example.text: [The numbers 1.4142 and 1.4987]-1 can be truncated *T*-1 to 1.4.
